DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of sofosbuvir (GS-7977; PSI-7977) administered in combination with pegylated interferon and ribavirin (PEG/RBV) in treatment-naive patients with HCV genotypes 1,4,5,6, or indeterminate genotype.
DOC.brief_title: Sofosbuvir With Pegylated Interferon and Ribavirin Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Genotypes 1,4,5,6
DOC.criteria: Males and females with Chronic Hepatitis C (HCV) Genotype 1,4,5,6, or indeterminate Naive to previous HCV treatment Positive for HBsAg, antiHBc IgM Ab, or antiHIV Ab History of any other clinically significant chronic liver disease
